mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOMS(hotel_id, grade, price, max_dogs, room_image, intro) VALUES (#{hotelId}, #{grade}, #{price}, #{maxDogs}, #{roomImage}, #{intro})
mapper.select: SELECT grade, hotel_id, count(*) as "room_count", price, max_dogs, room_image, intro FROM ROOMS WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId} GROUP BY hotel_id, grade, price, max_dogs, room_image, intro ORDER BY price

SELECT grade, hotel_id, count(*) as "room_count", price, max_dogs, room_image, intro FROM ROOMS WHERE hotel_id = #{hotelId} and grade = #{grade} GROUP BY hotel_id, grade, price, max_dogs, room_image, intro
